description: False indigo (Baptisia 'Pink Lemonade' Decadence Deluxe) is a stunning plant with a unique beauty. Delicate trusses of lemon-blush blooms tower over the deep green foliage in summer. This bushy and compact perennial has a long bloom period and, when planted en masse, will create an eye-catching display ideal for any garden. In addition to its eye-catching beauty, false indigo is low-maintenance and a great choice for attracting pollinators such as bees and butterflies. It's also winter-hardy and drought-tolerant, making it an easy-to-care-for addition to any landscape.
